Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_project.Game_Objects.GameObject

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class Actor
extends GameObject
    A GameObject that is capable of moving around.
